snippet: Stocks rallied to new highs on Tuesday as investors bought on the expectation that stimulus by the Fed would help propel the rally further.
abstract: Stocks rally to new highs as investors pick up large companies' shares on expectation that stimulus by Federal Reserve will help propel rally further.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rallied to new highs on Tuesday as investors bought on the expectation that stimulus by the Fed would help propel the rally further.

headline.main: Big Companies Lead 3 Major Indexes to Highs
headline.print_headline: Big Companies Lead 3 Major Indexes to Highs
